about_the_game:
Setting:
Bonfire Kingdom offers a dark fantasy scenario - like a hauntingly beautiful German fairy tale. The dangerous world full of dragons, witches, and knights emphasizes the feeling of shelter and comfort in your own village. City building has never been so cozy!

Gameplay:
Bonfire Kingdom offers a unique combination of city builder and RPG, requiring interesting decisions. Harvested resources and looted treasures can be invested in equipment and weapons, but can also upgrade the village. Merciless penalties or the theft of taxes may be necessary to strengthen the troops and defenses, ensuring the survival of the whole village.
Because one thing is certain - the next night will come and new horrors will follow!




Our once proud kingdom fell apart when the king mysteriously disappeared. The enemies of the realm took advantage of this weakness. They came out of the shadows and devastated entire regions, villages, and cities. The kingdom sank into darkness.
That happened over 20 years ago. The kingdom has fallen, but the lands are beginning to heal.

Groups of survivors are looking for protection and leadership. Some are now gathering around you. They are hopeful that you, unlike your predecessors, will not rob and leave them in their misery.
In the ashes of a fallen kingdom, you build your settlement.
What kind of leader will you be?




Build a kingdom - starting with a single bonfire.

  • Management of a complex building and goods system
  • In-depth simulation of the villagers
  • Villagers will react to your actions...
  • ... will you flip through love letters or feel a cold blade at your throat?
  • Resources and looted treasures improve the village
  • Forge new equipment and weapons and train your warriors
  • Enjoy the pleasures of the tavern...
  • (... and its backrooms)




Defend your kingdom.

  • Creatures leave their shadows at night and attack the village
  • Epic battles with powerful enemies that rage on for several nights
  • The walls must not break until dawn




Explore the fallen kingdom.

  • Uncover secrets that would have been better left hidden
  • Dark rituals could save you - or bring doom to all
  • Loot legendary treasures and alleviate the suffering of your people...
  • ... or show off the finest weapons and armors and bask in your own glory

Will you dare to venture into the darkness?

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 2100GE
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Bonfire Kingdom is a survival city builder mixed with RPG elements in a dark medieval fantasy world - like a hauntingly beautiful German fairy tale. Superior enemies are creeping out of the darkness. Protect your village by leading your band of loyal knights into battle.
